description: Prompts for premium skincare/lifestyle ad generation. Same model description across varied scenes, locations, props, and wardrobe.

model_profile.hair: smooth long dark brown hair styled in loose waves

prompts.name: bathtub_spa_rose_petals
prompts.text: A professional lifestyle product photoshoot featuring a young woman sitting in a modern white bathtub filled with soft bubbles and scattered rose petals. The woman has smooth long dark brown hair styled in loose waves, a glowing natural makeup look, and a warm, friendly smile. She is wrapped in a pastel pink towel that covers her chest, creating an elegant spa-like appearance. She is holding a pink skincare product bottle (with floral design and pump dispenser) in her right hand, clearly visible to the camera. The background includes rolled white towels neatly stacked on a wooden table, green indoor plants, and softly glowing candles for a relaxing ambiance. Natural light streams in from a nearby window, creating a bright yet cozy atmosphere. Lighting is soft, warm, and evenly balanced, highlighting the modelâ€™s skin tone and the product bottle. The overall mood is luxurious, refreshing, and calming, with high-resolution studio quality, sharp details, and clean composition suitable for premium skincare advertising.

prompts.name: vanity_table_morning_glow
prompts.text: Premium skincare ad with the same young woman seated at a minimalist wooden vanity table near a window. Her long dark brown wavy hair frames her glowing face with natural makeup and a warm smile. She wears a soft cream satin robe loosely tied, revealing a spa-like look. She holds a pink skincare bottle with a pump dispenser in her right hand, angled to showcase the label. On the vanity: folded white towels, a small vase of blush roses, a glass of cucumber water, and a round mirror reflecting soft morning light. The scene is bright, airy, and elegant with clean composition and gentle highlights on the product.

prompts.name: marble_bathroom_flatlay_and_hold
prompts.text: Editorial skincare scene in a luxury marble bathroom. The same model, long dark brown waves and natural makeup, smiles softly while sitting on the tub edge. She wears a pastel robe with delicate piping. In her right hand she holds a pink floral pump skincare bottle to camera. Surrounding props: rolled white towels, a wooden bath brush, eucalyptus leaves, a lit candle in frosted glass, and a silk eye mask. Crisp, high-resolution image with balanced soft lighting and subtle reflections on marble for a premium aesthetic.

prompts.name: garden_patio_morning_dew
prompts.text: Lifestyle skincare ad on a serene garden patio. The same woman with long dark brown waves and natural makeup sits on a white cushioned bench. She wears a pastel pink summer dress with delicate straps. In her right hand, she presents a pink pump skincare bottle against a backdrop of green plants with morning dew. Props: wicker tray with rolled towel, small bowl of rose petals, and a glass bottle of infused water. Soft sun rays and gentle bokeh create a refreshing, premium feel.

prompts.name: spa_lounge_candles_and_wood
prompts.text: Premium spa lounge setting: warm wooden textures, ambient candles, and indoor palms. The same model with long brown wavy hair and natural glow sits comfortably on a white chaise, wrapped in a plush white towel. She smiles warmly while holding a pink floral pump skincare bottle in her right hand, label facing forward. Composition is clean and centered with soft, even lighting and gentle rim light to separate subject from background.

prompts.name: sunlit_bedroom_minimal
prompts.text: Minimalist, sunlit bedroom. The same woman with long dark brown waves and natural makeup sits near a window on crisp white bedding, wearing a pastel loungewear set. She holds a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand, slightly elevated, clearly visible. Props: a eucalyptus branch in a simple ceramic vase, neatly folded towel, and a hardcover book. Bright, cozy, and premium editorial style with soft shadows and clean lines.

prompts.name: hotel_bath_suite_gold_accents
prompts.text: High-end hotel bath suite with gold accents and large mirror. The same model, glowing complexion and warm smile, stands beside a freestanding tub, wearing a silky blush robe. In her right hand, she presents a pink floral skincare bottle to the camera. On the counter: rolled towels, rose petals, and a glass jar of cotton pads. Lighting is soft and luxurious, with reflections carefully controlled for a polished advertisement look.

prompts.name: tropical_indoor_greenery
prompts.text: Lifestyle skincare scene surrounded by lush indoor tropical plants. The same young woman with long dark brown waves and natural makeup sits on a light rattan chair, wrapped in a pale pink towel. She holds a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand, angled slightly toward the camera. Natural light filters through leaves, casting soft patterns. Props: white towel stack, bamboo tray, and a candle. Fresh, premium, relaxing ambiance.

prompts.name: evening_bath_time_candle_glow
prompts.text: Cozy evening bath ambiance: the same model in a white tub with gentle bubbles, rose petals floating. Warm candlelight illuminates her glowing skin and long wavy hair. She smiles softly, holding a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand, clearly framed. Surroundings: rolled towels, a wooden stool, and small glass jars. The mood is romantic, premium, and calming with cinematic highlights and soft shadows.

prompts.name: scandinavian_spa_monochrome
prompts.text: Scandinavian-inspired spa set with light wood, matte white ceramics, and greenery. The same woman with long dark brown waves and natural makeup sits on a bench, wearing a minimal pastel robe. She holds a pink floral pump bottle in her right hand. Props: white towels, eucalyptus bundle, and a stone tray. Bright, minimalist, and editorial with clean composition and sharp details.

prompts.name: window_light_shower_scene
prompts.text: Modern shower backdrop with frosted glass and soft window light. The same model, hair in loose waves and natural makeup, is wrapped in a pastel towel. She presents a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand to camera. Props: small potted plant, folded towel, and a wooden bath brush on a shelf. Crisp, high-resolution, premium commercial style.

prompts.name: rose_garden_outdoors
prompts.text: Outdoor rose garden lifestyle skincare ad. The same woman with long dark brown waves and natural makeup stands by a white garden bench, wearing a light floral summer dress. She holds a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: bouquet of fresh roses, white towel, and a delicate lace cloth. Soft morning light, airy bokeh, premium editorial look.

prompts.name: marble_countertop_closeup
prompts.text: Close-up hero shot with the same model leaning near a marble countertop. Her wavy dark brown hair and glowing natural makeup frame a warm smile. She holds a pink floral pump skincare bottle in her right hand at chest height, clearly lit. Props: neatly rolled towel, sprig of rosemary, candle. High-resolution, soft, even lighting and clean composition.

prompts.name: terracotta_spa_retreat
prompts.text: Terracotta-toned spa retreat with textured walls and soft linens. The same model wears a blush wrap dress, long wavy hair and natural makeup glowing. She presents a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: white towels, a clay bowl with petals, and a woven basket. Warm, balanced light for a luxurious, calming atmosphere.

prompts.name: minimal_studio_backdrop
prompts.text: Premium studio setup with seamless off-white backdrop. The same woman with long dark brown waves and natural makeup stands three-quarter to camera, smiling warmly. She holds a pink floral pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Minimal props: small white block and a soft plant shadow. Clean, modern, high-end advertising look with perfect exposure and sharp detail.

prompts.name: japanese_spa_onzen_inspired
prompts.text: Onsen-inspired indoor spa scene with wooden tub elements. The same model, wavy dark brown hair and natural makeup, is wrapped in a pale towel. She holds a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: rolled towels, bamboo tray, small stones, and a candle. Soft, zen-like lighting for a premium wellness aesthetic.

prompts.name: sunset_window_silhouette
prompts.text: Golden-hour window scene. The same woman sits on a window bench, warm sunlight outlining her wavy hair and glowing complexion. She presents a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: folded towel, small vase with a single rose. Warm, cozy, luxurious mood with balanced highlights.

prompts.name: coastal_bathroom_breezy
prompts.text: Coastal-inspired bathroom with light blue-gray tones and white accents. The same model, long dark brown waves and natural makeup, wears a pastel robe. She holds a pink floral pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: white towels, seashell dish, and a glass jar. Soft daylight, fresh and premium editorial style.

prompts.name: urban_loft_green_corner
prompts.text: Urban loft vibe with concrete textures and a lush green plant corner. The same woman with wavy dark brown hair and natural makeup sits on a soft chair, wrapped in a pastel towel. She holds a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: rolled towels, candle, small side table. Bright yet cozy lighting, high-resolution, modern premium look.

prompts.name: white_tile_shower_bokeh
prompts.text: Bright white-tile shower background with soft bokeh. The same model, long wavy brown hair and natural makeup, smiles warmly. She presents a pink floral pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: eucalyptus on the shower head, folded towel on a bench. Clean, crisp, luxurious ad style.

prompts.name: spa_retail_shelf_display
prompts.text: Premium spa retail shelf display as backdrop. The same woman with dark brown waves and natural glow stands in front of neatly arranged skincare shelves. She holds a pink pump bottle in her right hand at chest level. Props: towels, tester jars, small plants. Soft, even lighting and high-end commercial finish.

prompts.name: white_bathrobe_windowlight
prompts.text: Soft window-lit portrait. The same model in a plush white bathrobe, hair in loose waves and natural makeup glowing. She holds a pink floral pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: white towel stack and a candle on a small table. Bright, clean, premium editorial composition.

prompts.name: rooftop_sunrise_yoga
prompts.text: Rooftop sunrise wellness scene. The same woman with long dark brown waves and natural makeup sits cross-legged on a pastel yoga mat, wearing a soft blush athleisure set. She holds a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand near her knee, label visible. Background: warm dawn sky, subtle city skyline bokeh, potted grasses. Props: rolled white towel, glass water bottle with lemon. Soft golden light, fresh, premium, uplifting mood.

prompts.name: art_deco_hotel_lobby
prompts.text: Elegant art-deco hotel lobby with marble floors and brass accents. The same model wears a tailored pastel pink midi dress with delicate earrings. She stands near a velvet lounge chair, smiling, holding a pink floral pump skincare bottle in her right hand at chest level. Props: fresh flowers on a side table, folded towel in a chic tote. Soft, directional lighting with refined highlights for a luxurious ad look.

prompts.name: minimal_concrete_spa
prompts.text: Minimal concrete spa interior with textured gray walls and a calm reflecting pool. The same woman, long wavy dark hair and natural makeup, is wrapped in a pale robe. She presents a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: eucalyptus branch, white towels stacked on a stone bench, single candle. Clean, contemporary composition with gentle soft boxes and subtle reflections.

prompts.name: winter_cabin_wellness
prompts.text: Cozy winter wellness cabin with warm wood and a frosted window view. The same model wears a cream knit wrap and pastel lounge pants. She sits on a cushioned bench, holding a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: folded towel, steaming herbal tea, pine sprig. Soft, warm lighting with a calm premium mood and crisp detail.

prompts.name: beach_boardwalk_sunrise
prompts.text: Fresh sunrise by a beach boardwalk. The same woman with long wavy dark brown hair and natural makeup wears a flowing pastel sundress. She holds a pink floral pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: straw tote with white towel and a small bouquet of roses. Gentle ocean breeze feel, bright yet soft lighting, premium editorial vibe.

prompts.name: modern_kitchen_selfcare
prompts.text: Bright modern kitchen self-care moment. The same model in a pastel satin robe leans on a marble island, smiling warmly. She presents a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: rolled towel, small vase with eucalyptus, lemon water in a clear glass. Clean, high-end lifestyle composition with natural window light.

prompts.name: boutique_dressing_room
prompts.text: Chic boutique dressing room with soft blush curtains and gold-rim mirror. The same woman wears a pastel slip dress with a delicate necklace. She holds a pink floral pump skincare bottle in her right hand, label forward. Props: neatly folded white towels, perfume tray, single rose stem. Soft, flattering lighting and refined, premium styling.

prompts.name: library_reading_nook
prompts.text: Calm reading nook with built-in shelves and a window seat. The same model, natural glowing makeup and long waves, wears a pastel cardigan over a simple dress. She holds a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand as she smiles to camera. Props: white towel, candle, small vase with babyâ€™s breath. Bright, cozy, editorial composition with gentle highlights.

prompts.name: desert_resort_cabana
prompts.text: Luxury desert resort cabana with soft linens and neutral tones. The same woman wrapped in a pastel robe reclines comfortably, holding a pink floral pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: rolled towels, clay vase with dried florals, glass of infused water. Warm, sun-kissed lighting with a premium, serene feel.

prompts.name: rainy_window_cozy_bath
prompts.text: Cozy bath scene near a rain-speckled window. The same model with long dark brown wavy hair and natural makeup is wrapped in a soft pastel towel. She presents a pink pump skincare bottle in her right hand. Props: stacked white towels, lit candle, small plant on a stool. Soft, diffused lighting with reflective highlights for a high-end, calming mood.

prompts.name: beach_sand_flatlay_shells
prompts.text: Product-only hero on warm beach sand. Place the pink skincare bottle with pump dispenser slightly embedded in soft sand, label facing camera. Surround with seashells, a small starfish, and gentle wave foam creeping into frame. High-end commercial lighting with subtle top light and soft fill; crisp details on sand grains and bottle texture.

prompts.name: beach_towel_sunhat_shadowplay
prompts.text: Product on a pastel-striped beach towel with a woven sunhat casting natural shadows. Pink pump bottle centered, label sharp; small sea glass and coral fragments as accents. Bright, sunny exposure with controlled highlights and true-to-color rendition.

prompts.name: beach_driftwood_podium
prompts.text: Premium product showcase on a weathered driftwood pedestal set on beach sand. Pink skincare bottle stands upright with clean label. Background: soft ocean horizon bokeh. Balanced daylight with subtle kicker to define bottle edges.

prompts.name: forest_moss_stone_macro
prompts.text: Close-up product on a moss-covered stone in a lush forest. Dewy droplets on the pink bottle surface, fine condensation visible. Dappled sunlight filtering through leaves creates organic bokeh. Editorial composition with shallow depth of field.

prompts.name: forest_log_still_life
prompts.text: Product-only still life on a smooth-cut log slice. Pink pump bottle centered with fern leaves, eucalyptus sprig, and small white wildflowers. Soft, cool forest light with gentle vignette for a premium, earthy feel.

prompts.name: waterfall_rock_spray
prompts.text: Dynamic waterfall backdrop with the product placed on a wet rock ledge. Pink bottle with pump shows subtle water droplets; fine mist in air catches light. Fast shutter look for crisp product, soft motion blur in water for energy. High-end advertising finish.

prompts.name: waterfall_pool_reflection
prompts.text: Product on a thin black stone just at the waterâ€™s edge, forming a clean reflection beneath the pink bottle. Soft bluish tones, silky waterfall bokeh in background. Controlled specular highlights on the bottle for a polished, luxurious look.

prompts.name: billboard_city_twilight_mock
prompts.text: Large-format billboard showcase: isolate the pink skincare bottle as the hero image on a sleek billboard in a city twilight scene. Ambient city lights and traffic bokeh below. Ensure the product photo is ultra-sharp, color-accurate, and framed like a real outdoor ad.

prompts.name: bus_shelter_ad_lightbox
prompts.text: Transit shelter lightbox advertisement concept. The pink pump bottle is the central graphic on a clean, premium background with subtle floral motif. Present the scene as a realistic street photograph at dusk, with the ad glowing softly and reflections on glass.

prompts.name: showcase_podium_acrylic
prompts.text: Product-only on a glossy white podium with clear acrylic risers. Pink skincare bottle centered; soft gradient backdrop. Studio lighting with key, fill, and rim for crisp edges; faint floor reflection for a high-end cosmetic display feel.

prompts.name: marble_plinth_soft_shadow
prompts.text: Minimal studio scene: pink pump bottle on a white marble plinth. Clean off-white background, soft directional light creating elegant long shadows. Hyper-real detail on label and pump; editorial cosmetic photography style.

prompts.name: mirror_reflection_beauty_table
prompts.text: Product on a vanity table with a round mirror creating a tasteful reflection of the pink bottle. Props: single rose petal, folded white towel. Balanced studio light with precise control of reflections and highlights on bottle and mirror.

prompts.name: bathroom_tile_contrast
prompts.text: Product-only against matte white subway tiles with soft window light. Pink bottle on a slim shelf with a small eucalyptus sprig. Clean, clinical-luxe aesthetic, true whites, and razor-sharp label clarity.

prompts.name: sandstone_canyon_minimal
prompts.text: Sculptural product shot within a sandstone-inspired set. Pink bottle nestled between warm textured forms, subtle shadows and highlights sculpting the scene. Premium, art-directed cosmetic showcase.

prompts.name: floating_on_water_highlight
prompts.text: Pink skincare bottle placed on a small clear acrylic platform just under the water surface, appearing to float. Gentle ripples create caustic light patterns. Clean, modern luxury presentation with high detail and controlled reflections.

prompts.name: ice_block_freshness
prompts.text: Cooling freshness concept: product partially embedded in a crystal-clear ice block on a reflective surface. Fine condensation and micro-droplets on the pink bottle. Cool-toned studio lighting with crisp, premium finish.

prompts.name: botanical_laboratory_glassware
prompts.text: Laboratory-chic set: pink bottle among clear glass beakers and pipettes, with botanical extracts (rose petals, eucalyptus) suspended in water. Backlit translucency, pristine cleanliness, and clinical luxury mood.

prompts.name: store_endcap_merchandising
prompts.text: Retail endcap display concept: pyramid of product boxes with the pink pump bottle hero at front. Clean POS signage, soft shelf lighting, and neat arrangement. Present as a realistic retail photograph with premium brand cues.

prompts.name: gift_box_ribbon_unboxing
prompts.text: Premium gift unboxing scene. Pink skincare bottle in a pastel box with satin ribbon partially opened. Tissue paper, rose petals, and a minimalist card. Soft, cozy lighting and luxurious detail for a festive, premium feel.

prompts.name: night_starry_beach_long_exposure
prompts.text: Night beach concept: pink bottle on smooth sand with low, warm key light. Long-exposure sky with soft star trails; faint ocean line in distance. Product remains tack-sharp, with gentle, cinematic glow for a premium, imaginative ad.

prompts.name: aurora_ice_shore_glow
prompts.text: Dreamlike arctic-style concept: product-only scene with the pink skincare bottle on dark volcanic sand near ice fragments. Subtle low key light on the bottle; distant aurora borealis paints a soft gradient in the sky. Crisp, premium look with controlled cool tones and micro-detail on bottle and ice.

prompts.name: prism_rainbow_dispersion_studio
prompts.text: High-concept studio shot with glass prisms casting rainbow dispersion across a clean backdrop. Pink pump bottle centered on a matte pedestal; colorful light bands graze the label and pump. Ultra-precise reflections, minimal props, and a modern luxury cosmetic aesthetic.

prompts.name: projection_mapping_facade
prompts.text: Nighttime urban art concept: product hero image integrated into a projection-mapped building facade. The pink skincare bottle appears luminous and larger-than-life, with floral animated overlays. Realistic street reflections, cinematic contrast, and premium campaign feel.

prompts.name: topdown_beach_sand_art_logo
prompts.text: Top-down drone-style composition: product on smooth beach sand with a circular sand art pattern radiating from the bottle, hinting at brand motifs. Gentle surf line in corner; crisp shadows and label clarity. Bright, fresh, and eye-catching for outdoor ads.

prompts.name: neon_night_market_reflections
prompts.text: Vibrant neon market atmosphere: product placed on a glossy black tabletop with vivid neon signage reflected on the surface. Pink bottle stands sharp against colorful bokeh. Controlled specular highlights and modern nightlife energy for a bold premium ad.
